text:
@Mike_Pence @SenateGOP Hey @VP aren’t you in the #coronavirus task for?

How’s our National Strategy coming along?

What is our National Strategy?

You’re failure to do anything during this pandemic constitutes negligent Homicide. https://t.co/zI0GO7kHJW
